name: antipathetic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
showing or feeling a strong dislike, opposition, or anger: antipathetic attitudes towards smokers Even those normally antipathetic to anything new approve of the design of the new railway station. See
antipathy
More examplesFewer examplesNot so long ago rich people in drama were automatically antipathetic.Many people feel that pre-nuptial agreements are antipathetic to the state of being in love.He doesn’t think evolution and intelligent design are antipathetic.
